definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: pit, ditch, trench, (Ar. jawbah;un hollow, depression; Syr. guwbo0 cistern)—only pl. [[גֵּבִים]] Je 14:3; in 2Ki 3:16 [[גבים גבים]], i.e. full of ditches; further, cisterns (acc. to Klo 2Ki 25:12) Je 39:10 [[וִּיגֵבִים]] (rd. [[וְגֵבִים]]); cf. also ‖ 2Ki 25:12 ([[ולגבים]] Kt, [[וּלְיוֹגְבִים]] Qr) = Je 52:16 ([[וּלְיׁגְבִים]]; both c. [[כּׂרְמִים]]); Klo prop. to emend these, so as to rd. in all [[וַיִּתֵּן לָהֶם כְּרָמִים וְגֵבִים]] and gave to them vineyards and cisterns; another view in Th; cf. further [[גוב]], [[יגב]].—I. [[גֵּב]] v. sub [[גבה]].
